page.title: 16ENERGY
page.content: MANY FUELS ARE USED HERE TO MAKE ENERGY.WE HAVE A BIG OIL TANK OUTSIDE THE SCHOOL BUILDING.THE OIL IS PUMPED TO A BOILER WHICH HEATS WATER WHICH IS PUMPED ALL AROUND THE SCHOOL.MANY HOUSES HAVE THE SAME KIND OF CENTRAL HEATING SYSTEM.OTHERS ARE HEATED IN THE SAME WAY BUT INSTEAD OF USING OIL FOR THE FIRE THEY BURN GAS.THE GAS COMES THROUGH UNDERGROUND PIPES TO THE HOUSES.MANY FAMILIES HAVE GAS FIRES IN THEIR ROOMS INSTEAD OF CENTRAL HEATING AND MANY COOK THEIR FOOD ON GAS COOKERS.THE OLDEST FUEL HERE MUST HAVE BEEN WOOD AND SOME HOMES STILL HAVE WOOD BURNING STOVES WHILE MANY OTHERS HAVE COAL AND COKE FIRES.ALL THE HOMES I KNOW OF HAVE ELECTRICITY TO GIVE LIGHT.SOME USE IT FOR HEAT THROUGH NIGHT STORAGE HEATERS OR ELECTRIC FIRES.
